TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CompressionMethod extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Contains the values of the compression methods used to compress the payload data of the WebSocket Data frame.
Docs.remarks: The CompressionMethod enumeration contains the values of the compression methods defined in Compression Extensions for WebSocket.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.CompressionMethod DEFLATE = unsigned int8(1)
.field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.CompressionMethod NONE = unsigned int8(0)
